about_the_game:
Lones is a single-player game about exploration and mystery.

You embody a character fed up with his monotonous, stressful life. Always had a passion for photography and the great outdoors, you make a bold decision to leave it all behind for a life in the Canadian woods. All is calm, you enjoy your new life... until something peculiar happens... a mysterious shadows appear in your photos. This new mystery drives you even more to explore your new environment and to discover what or who is the shadow. Anything will be better than your old life.
